Description: Requesting to order goods for the warehouse
Answer: Login in to receipt using credentials provided by your organisation and in work select the order goods and fill the order form with necessary stock list

Description: Inquiry about receiving goods into the warehouse
Example Utterance: "Can you help me receive a shipment?"

Description: Request to allocate received goods to their designated storage locations
Example Utterance: "Where should I put away these items?"

Description: Checking the current stock levels of specific items
Example Utterance: "What is the inventory level of SKU123?"

Description: Request to pick items from the warehouse for fulfillment
Example Utterance: "I need to pick items for order #456."

Description: Inquiry or instruction regarding dispatching orders to customers or other destinations
Requesting to update inventory records (e.g., adjustments, transfers)
Example Utterance: "I need to update the inventory count."

Description: Asking for assistance to resolve issues related to warehouse operations
Example Utterance: "There's an issue with a shipment. Can you help?"

Description: Seeking information about warehouse policies, procedures, or general information
